remarks: For a nonempty word the sets of shifted words, expressd by a finite interval of integers or by a half-open integer range are identical. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jun-2018.)
statement:
scshwfzeqfzo $p |- ( ( X e. Word V /\ X =/= (/) /\ N = ( # ` X ) ) -> { y e. Word V | E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) y = ( X cyclShift n ) } = { y e. Word V | E. n e. ( 0 ..^ N ) y = ( X cyclShift n ) } ) $.
$d N n y $.
$d V n y $.
$d X n y $.
